name: Tanko Bushi Bon Odori Dance
description: Japanese Traditional Dance. Learn the basic movement of Tanko Bushi Bon Odori Dance

name: Traditional Malay Dance - Joget
description: Learn the graceful movements of Joget, a traditional Malay folk dance performed at celebrations and social events.

name: Zapin Dance Masterclass
description: Explore the elegant Zapin dance with its Arabic influences. Includes live feedback sessions.

name: Erhu for Beginners
description: Start your journey with the Chinese two-stringed violin. Learn proper bowing technique and basic melodies.

name: Chinese Classical Piano
description: Learn beautiful Chinese classical pieces on piano. From River Flows in You to traditional folk adaptations.

name: Kompang Drumming Workshop
description: Master the rhythmic patterns of Kompang drumming used in Malay weddings and celebrations.

name: Traditional Dikir Barat
description: Learn the call-and-response singing tradition from Kelantan. Includes rhythm, vocals, and hand movements.

name: Guzheng Fundamentals
description: Introduction to the Chinese zither. Learn finger techniques, basic scales, and your first traditional piece.

name: Bharatanatyam Basics
description: Classical Indian dance from Tamil Nadu. Learn basic postures, hand gestures (mudras), and footwork.
